34  |  Technology and InnovationSupporting Customers’ Needs 
Through Pragmatic Innovation 
ArcBest’s deep customer relationships are enriched by our long history of innovation. 
We invest heavily in strategic initiatives aimed at transformation, and we empower 
our employees to dedicate time to think and challenge the status quo. The ArcBest 
Technologies team is made up of nearly 500 highly engaged and creative tech and 
analytical professionals — engineers, mathematicians, data scientists, software 
developers, information system specialists and more — who create smart solutions 
that deliver value to our customers and drive our industry forward. 
Each year, ArcBest invests nearly $150 million on technology and innovation, with 50% 
of that investment prioritized toward strategic projects and transformative initiatives 
— that’s compared to a 2020 industry benchmark of 31% as reported by Gartner.
